allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add breakout room timekeeper app

- Visual progress diagram showing current step
- Auto-advance timer with audio alerts
- Support for 3 participants with 4 activities each

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update design to calm, minimal style

- Light background with muted colors
- Removed animations and shadows
- Softer green accent color
- Cleaner typography

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
